snippet.title: Christmas Griddlers: Journey to Santa Trailer
snippet.description:
Download Free: https://www.gamefools.com/pc-games/christmas-griddlers-journey-to-santa.html

Prepare for a joyous adventure with this collection of holiday griddlers. Visit Santa Claus and feel the wind rush through your hair as you ride his sled and receive multitude of gifts. Explore six different locations where 100 themed puzzles of varying difficulty await you. For more comfortable gameplay, choose one of the two tutorial modes, one for new players and one for more experienced griddler fans.  Immerse yourself in the holiday atmosphere with Christmas Griddlers: Journey to Santa.
